scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku:local: npm run heroku:env && npm install && npm run heroku-postbuild && REPOSITORY_IMPLEMENTATION=postgres PORT=9000 heroku local
